application_protocol.name: nut_and_bolt
application_protocol.purpose: The nut and bolt application protocol supports the requirement to represent nuts and bolts for ordering purposes. AP

definition.def: Cylindrical threaded fastener with hexagonal head.

fundamentals.p: This clause may include a data planning model that is more detailed than that in the introduction.
fundamentals.note: References to the application activity model may be included as notes.

usage_guide.p: This clause describes usages of this application protocol.

tech_disc.p: This clause contains technical discussion of this application protocol.
